claims.claim: Ramp achieved $22.5 billion valuation and $1 billion annualized revenue in 2025
claims.quote: New York-based fintech Ramp is definitely among that rapidly growing bunch, having achieved a valuation of $22.5 billion, as well as annualized revenue of $1 billion, in 2025.

claims.claim: Ramp's valuation increased from $13 billion to $22.5 billion in just a few months
claims.quote: That's up from a valuation of $13 billion just a few months earlier in March, as well as an increase from annualized revenue of $700 million as of January.

claims.claim: Ramp began generating positive cash flow in 2025
claims.quote: The company says it began 'generating cash flow' earlier this year.

claims.claim: AI enables Ramp customers to be 3x more productive than two years ago
claims.quote: He claims that thanks in part to AI, Ramp customers can get 3x more done in Ramp today than they could just two years ago.

claims.claim: Ramp grew from 30,000 to over 45,000 customers in less than a year
claims.quote: Today, Ramp has more than 45,000 customers, up from over 30,000 in early March.

claims.claim: Ramp raised $700 million in less than two months to fund AI investments
claims.quote: AI robots are coming for expense accounts – and fintech startup Ramp has raised $700 million in less than two months to help speed the adoption of automation tools in corporate finances.

claims.claim: Manual expense approval processes cost $20 and 14 minutes per transaction
claims.quote: The manual process requires 14 minutes and $20 of human intervention cost for questions, approvals, audits and coding of the coffee expense.

claims.claim: AI agents can reduce procurement schedules from weeks to minutes
claims.quote: AI agents will start handling these workflows in a parallel process, with procurement schedules reduced from a week or more to minutes, according to Glyman.

claims.claim: Ramp helps average company cut expenses by 3.5% per year
claims.quote: Our service helps the average company cut their expenses by 3.5% per year and speed up month-end close processes by 8 days each month.

claims.claim: Ramp speeds up month-end financial closing by 8 days per month
claims.quote: Our service helps the average company cut their expenses by 3.5% per year and speed up month-end close processes by 8 days each month.

claims.claim: Ramp processes billions of dollars in purchases annually across 100+ countries
claims.quote: With Stripe's platform, we're able to ship custom-printed, high-quality metal cards with short delivery timelines to over 100 countries and power billions of dollars of purchases each year.
